Product Details.question: Tell me about braces
Product Details.answer: Braces are devices used to align and straighten teeth.

customer_service.question: Check my order
customer_service.answer: Sure! Please provide your order number.

customer_service.question: Cancel an order
customer_service.answer: I can help with cancellations. Please confirm your order number.

order_tracking.question: Where is my order
order_tracking.answer: You can track your order status in 'My Account' > 'Order History'. Live tracking updates are available once your package ships.

order_tracking.question: How long does delivery take
order_tracking.answer: Standard delivery takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping delivers within 24 hours for eligible areas.

product_information.question: Is this item in stock
product_information.answer: Real-time stock availability is shown on the product page. Items marked 'In Stock' ship immediately.

product_information.question: What are the product specifications?
product_information.answer: Full specifications are listed under the 'Product Details' section. Contact support for technical queries.

returns_refunds.question: How do I return an item
returns_refunds.answer: Initiate returns via 'Order History' within 30 days. Print the prepaid label and attach it to your package.

returns_refunds.question: When will I get my refund
returns_refunds.answer: Refunds process within 5 business days after we receive your return. Payment method determines refund timing.

payment_issues.question: What payment methods do you accept
payment_issues.answer: We accept Visa, Mastercard, PayPal, and Klarna. All transactions are SSL-secured.

payment_issues.question: Why was my payment declined
payment_issues.answer: Common reasons: insufficient funds, incorrect CVV, or bank security block. Contact your bank for details.

account_support.question: How do I reset my password
account_support.answer: Use 'Forgot Password' on the login page. A reset link will be sent to your registered email.

account_support.question: Can I merge multiple accounts
account_support.answer: Account merging isn't supported for security reasons. Please use one primary account for all purchases.

dental_products.question: What types of braces do you offer?
dental_products.answer: We offer traditional metal braces, ceramic braces, lingual braces, and Invisalign. Each type has its own benefits depending on your needs.

dental_products.question: How much does Invisalign cost?
dental_products.answer: Invisalign treatment typically ranges from $3,000 to $7,000 depending on the complexity. Financing and insurance options are available.

dental_products.question: Do you offer clear braces?
dental_products.answer: Yes, we offer clear ceramic braces which are less noticeable compared to traditional metal braces.

treatment_plans.question: How long does treatment take?
treatment_plans.answer: Treatment time varies. Traditional braces take 18-24 months on average, while Invisalign can take 12-18 months depending on the case.

treatment_plans.question: Do I need a retainer after braces?
treatment_plans.answer: Yes, retainers help maintain your teeth alignment after braces are removed. We offer both fixed and removable retainers.

payment_insurance.question: Do you accept insurance for braces?
payment_insurance.answer: Yes, we accept most major insurance plans. Please check with your provider to confirm coverage.

payment_insurance.question: Do you offer payment plans?
payment_insurance.answer: Yes, we offer flexible payment plans to make orthodontic treatment affordable. Contact us for details.

maintenance_care.question: How do I clean my Invisalign trays?
maintenance_care.answer: Rinse them with lukewarm water and brush gently with a soft toothbrush. Avoid hot water as it can warp the trays.

maintenance_care.question: What foods should I avoid with braces?
maintenance_care.answer: Avoid sticky, hard, or chewy foods like gum, popcorn, and caramel to prevent damage to your braces.
